text:
The current build xml points to a version of xerces that has been removed from
the repository.

This patch matches the jar used to the one that is in cvs.

(There is no build "component" so I've assigned it to server).
creator: kevin@rocketred.com.au
kevin@rocketred.com.au
text:
Created attachment 7148
Patch to correct the version of xerces added to the core libs.
